question: Which of the following is equivalent to 1 a.m.u?
option1: 1/12th of the mass of the helium atom
option2: 1/12th of the mass of the hydrogen atom
option3: 1/12th of the mass of the oxygen atom
option4: 1/12th of the mass of the carbon atom
answer: 1/12th of the mass of the carbon atom
explanation: 1 atomic mass unit (u) is defined as 1/12th of the mass of the carbon (12C) atom.
